default.zh: 总结一下今天的安全态势
最近有哪些需要关注的安全事件
default.en: What security incidents need attention recently

default.zh: 当前最紧急的安全问题是什么
default.en: What is the most urgent security issue right now

default.zh: 帮我分析一下整体的安全趋势
default.en: Help me analyze the overall security trends

/incidents.zh: 哪些事件需要优先处理
最近的事件处理效率如何
/incidents.en: How is the recent incident handling efficiency

/incidents/detail.zh: 帮我分析一下这个事件的严重程度
/incidents/detail.en: Help me analyze the severity of this incident

/incidents/detail.zh: 这个事件涉及哪些资产和告警
/incidents/detail.en: What assets and alerts are involved in this incident

/incidents/detail.zh: 这个事件的处理建议是什么
/incidents/detail.en: What are the handling recommendations for this incident

/incidents/detail.zh: 类似的事件之前是如何处理的
/incidents/detail.en: How were similar incidents handled before

/alerts.en: How many high risk alerts are open

/alerts.zh: 哪些告警需要立即处理
最近告警的趋势是什么
/alerts.en: What is the recent alert trend
Which sources have the most alerts

/alerts/detail.zh: 帮我分析一下这个告警
这个告警是否与其他告警有关联
/alerts/detail.en: Is this alert related to other alerts

/alerts/detail.zh: 这个告警的处理步骤是什么
/alerts/detail.en: What are the handling steps for this alert

/vulnerabilities.zh: 还有多少高危漏洞未修复
/vulnerabilities.en: How many high-risk vulnerabilities are unpatched

/vulnerabilities.zh: 哪些漏洞需要优先处理
最近漏洞的修复进度如何
/vulnerabilities.en: What is the recent vulnerability patching progress

/vulnerabilities.zh: 哪些资产存在最多的漏洞
/vulnerabilities.en: Which assets have the most vulnerabilities

/vulnerabilities/detail.zh: 帮我分析一下这个漏洞的影响范围
/vulnerabilities/detail.en: Help me analyze the impact scope of this vulnerability

/vulnerabilities/detail.zh: 这个漏洞的修复方案是什么
/vulnerabilities/detail.en: What is the remediation plan for this vulnerability

/vulnerabilities/detail.zh: 哪些资产受到这个漏洞影响
/vulnerabilities/detail.en: Which assets are affected by this vulnerability

/vulnerabilities/detail.zh: 这个漏洞的利用难度如何
/vulnerabilities/detail.en: What is the exploitation difficulty of this vulnerability
